remarks: Derive a weakened version of ~ ax-9 , where ` x ` and ` y ` must be distinct, from Separation ~ ax-sep and Extensionality ~ ax-ext .  In intuitionistic logic ~ a9evsep is stronger and also holds.  (Contributed by NM, 12-Nov-2013.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ax9vsep $p |- -. A. x -. x = y $.
$d x y $.
